post.body: speaking of Helvetica, if you like to wallpaper ur iPhone with type, ILoveTypography posted http://typenuts.com for iPhone wallpaprs
I've been checking the import schedule Excel sprdsht almost daily. what store you at? and what's the "C & E" dept?
is randyblue planning on CES (is it still called AdultDex?) + have there been any promo codes out lately? broke n horny here:(
am still lookin' for an "in" for comp passes, will let you know if I can score. u'd be interested to go?
proudly serving store 165 since 12/07. was looking to grand open import at CLT, positions filled quickly. still hopin' tho
have you tried the forums over at IKEAfans.com? (found your tweet via monitter.com)
I hear cheese + a mousetrap can stop a wandering mind in its tracks
p/t hours: 32hrs or less. you do get the full time benefits at a higher buy-in; but it's well worth it. (CA co-worker here)
IKEA Charlotte opens in Mar 09. Current co-worker here. (found your tweet via monitter.com)
Starting off the New Year New Week by ridding old apps from dad's laptop. Guilty of loading AOL goodness on his setup. it's bloaty
watching CNN, reports that their Dr. Sanjay Gupta as the next Surgeon General? *nods approvingly*
any linkage to free expo hall passes to #macworld? wondering if there are expo special with OTC (not so much) & FastMac (more preferred)
I've installed twirl for the XP box and my iBook. Let the fun begin.
happy that Cold Stone Creamery sells pre-packed quarts to-go, without waiting for the scoop show. can't customize, avail flavors good enuf
sees the front page of Zdnet.com: $1k is the new $2k for laptops. am curious about netbooks, tho
up early, rarity, awaiting MWSF09 keynote speech
home from work about and hour ago. hit Bay St before leaving. quiet along the street, beginnings of a slow retail stretch
trying to resolve HR issues, don't mess with my accured hours stupid new HR system
Sourdough toast, Costco Rotiss Chicken Salad + Food Network on t.v. It's definitely a Sunday night home from work.
another day at work, off early then making a christmas present return
